properties.label: Top Field
properties.name: field
properties.description: The field by which top results are sorted on.

properties.label: Results Number
properties.name: size
properties.description: The maximum number of top records sorted by 'field' in result (DEFAULT: 1)

properties.label: Ignore NULL Field
properties.name: ignoreNull
properties.description: Set to 'true' to ignore records with null value in the field to sort by (DEFAULT : false)
